other_tests.findings: Poor exercise tolerance limited by exertional dyspnea. Anginal-type symptoms with no ischemic ST segment changes. New, mild reversible defect of the inferior wall.

Gallbladder distended with shadowing gallstone at the fundus. Gallbladder wall thickened with trace edema. No focal or textural abnormalities noted in the liver. No intrahepatic or extrahepatic biliary ductal dilation.
